short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learnics Classroom Pro integrates Google Classroom with the Learnics platform for teachers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learnics Classroom Pro provides teachers with functionality to simplify the process of creating a Learnics assignment within Google Classroom.
